name: testPreviewDescriptionFromConfigurationPage
description: Verification of of presence Preview of description for MultiConfiguration Project can be added from Configuration Page
descriptionHtml: Verification of of presence Preview of description for MultiConfiguration Project can be added from Configuration Page

testStage.description: Verification of of presence Preview of description for MultiConfiguration Project can be added from Configuration Page

steps.name: Click on 'New Item' in the side menu
Click 'Save' button on the BaseConfigPage page
Click 'Logo' button and move to main page
Click on the 'Configure' button on side menu
Click on the 'Configure' Button on the Base Job Page
Logout from instance http://localhost:8080/
